name: A Mix of Trivia Questions Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the United States' Secret Service originally set up to do?
What exactly is Big Ben in London?
questions.explanation:
Bell.

	A lot of people thinks it's the clock but in reality it's the bell.

questions.text: What kind of acid would you find in Coca-Cola?

questions.correct: Rain Falling out of a cloud but not reaching the ground
questions.explanation: Rain Falling out of a cloud but not reaching the ground.

questions.text: Which of the following events is billed as 'The Biggest Outdoor show on Earth'?
What was Bugs Bunny's original name?
About 100 years ago, what was meant by 'owning a ordinary'?
questions.explanation:
Owning a bike.

	An Ordinary is one of those bike's with the big wheel in front and the little wheel in the back.

questions.text: In the 1930's, the moral watchdogs came down hard on two female entertainers, one was Mae West, Who was the other one?
questions.explanation:
Betty Boop.

	yes, an animated character.

questions.text: Where did John the Baptist do most of his baptisms?
Who had the best selling Autobiography in the 1980's?
